critique: The document is an executive order from 1939 that exempts certain positions from a previous executive order. It pertains to consultants, experts, specialists, attorneys, and other similar positions intermittently employed on a per diem basis or employed on an annual basis at amounts representing the value of part-time service required, and who are or have been paid from public works or other emergency funds administered by the Federal Works Administrator. The order was issued by the President of the United States.
